name: Spacerauzers
description:
Spacerauzers hopes to provide a satisfying spaceship combat experience.

It's  super fun and simple.

I've made a nice big update to the game, complete with things to shoot, points to score and sounds to hear! Thank you for your time and patience!

The game controls are on the start screen.

The diamond shape you see around you is your health meter.

Thank you for your time and I hope you have fun!
